roleset.name: apply thin liquid to surface in a messy manner
roleset.note: SPLATTER-V NOTES: Framed by Claire (from splatter.01-v)

example.name: Passive, with theme as prepositional complement
example.src: Passive, with theme as prepositional complement
example.type: Passive, with theme as prepositional complement
example.text: After a battle of over 30 years to prevent the entry of Canola oil into Egypt, are people weakening or have they lost their consciences for a fistful of dollars splatterd *none* with the blood and lives of Egyptians?
example.arg: with the blood and lives of Egyptians
